snippet: The biggest group planning demonstrations at the Democratic National Convention is now called the Coalition to March on Wall Street South — Building People’s Power During the DNC.
abstract: Biggest group planning to demonstrate in September at the Democratic National Convention in Charlotte, NC, has decided to change its name from the Coalition to Protest at the DNC to the Coalition to March on Wall Street South--Building People's Power During the DNC; name change spurs debate within the protest movement.
lead_paragraph: The biggest group planning demonstrations at the Democratic National Convention is now called the Coalition to March on Wall Street South — Building People’s Power During the DNC.

headline.seo: A Protest Group’s Name Change Stirs Debate
headline.main: Group Planning Protest at Party Convention Rankles Some With Name Change
headline.print_headline: Group Planning Protest at Party Convention Rankles Some With Name Change
